contributionDescription:
Developing website and grapich design. Cryptocurency to role moodel.To apply for RetroPGF 3, you will need to complete your profile and submit an application that describes your contributions and impact on the Optimism Collective. Your application information will be public on your profile (coming soon).

Filling out the application takes time, so we recommend that you start your application early.

Applications need to be submitted by October
impactDescription:
To apply for RetroPGF 3, you will need to complete your profile and submit an application that describes your contributions and impact on the Optimism Collective. Your application information will be public on your profile (coming soon).

Filling out the application takes time, so we recommend that you start your application early.

pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for including irrelevant and repeated content in both the contribution and impact descriptions, indicating potential spam.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application seems to be from a project as the description and bio talk about developing a website and graphic design, and there are no clear references to an individual's actions.
